name: GetComplied with GDPR for WordPress
author: RÃºben Martins

sections.description:
The New Standard in Compliance.

The most powerful and flexible platform that helps you comply with the GDPR EU rules, now with integration with WordPress.

Easily comply your WordPress website/e-commerce.

Key Features

  • Comply all your Projects from 1 Service
  • Unique Configuration
  • Legal Documents
  • Multi Platforms
  • Cookie Detection Notification
  • Webhooks for Integrations
  • Form Inputs
  • Rights Incidents Management
  • Submission Forms
  • Active Bar

Additional Features

  • Proof of Consent
  • Cookie Policy
  • Cookie Detection Alert
  • Third Party Consent
  • User Info Query Strings
  • Submission Forms
  • Individual Policies
  • 2 year consent renewal
  • Country of Processement
  • Input Forms
  • CustomID Property
  • Active bar
  • Right to update my data
  • Right to access my data
  • Right to be Forgotten
  • Validate Legacy Data
  • Data Attributes as Commands
  • Policy version update
  • Webhooks
  • Export to Excel
  • Personal Data Fields
  • Incidents History Log

Links

Official Website
Tutorial to configure Plugin
Facebook
Twitter
sections.installation:
1. Upload tm-getcomplied-wp.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to ‘Options’ -> ‘GetComplied’ and follow the instructions
sections.faq:
What is GetComplied?

GetComplied is the most powerful and flexible software for you to comply with the GDPR EU rules. Whenever you create a website, an app, a portal, a landing page, or a software, the GetComplied mission is to provide the most efficient solution to help you comply with the law.

How to use?

  1. Create and account at https://www.getcomplied.com?gc_aid=70 (please use the url provided to support the development of this plugin)
  2. Get your project id and insert in this plugin.
  3. That’s it you are good to go!
sections.changelog:

0.2.2

  • Added detailed tutorial to configure the plugin in links

0.2.1

  • Fix text domain for translation

0.2.0

  • Improved design and usability on the configuration page
  • Fixed load of script to use wp_enqueue_script
  • Cleaned up some code
  • Corrected localization of plugin to translate

0.1.0

  • First Version
